Calculation.name: CSharp
Python
Calculation.Definition:
import numpy as np
x1 = Input(name="X1", unit="mg/L", defaultValue=0.0) x2 = Input(name="X2", unit="mg/L", defaultValue=0.0) x3 = Input(name="X3", unit="mg/L", defaultValue=0.0)
Y = Output("Y", "m³/d", roundDigits=3)
api = Api()
def step(t, dt):
variables = Api.MakeVariableRefs([x1, x2, x3])
# tEnd = Timestamp.FromComponents(2025, 9, 17, 17, 00, 00) # tEnd = Timestamp.Now # tEnd = Timestamp.FromISO8601("2025-09-17T17:25") tEnd = Timestamp.FromPosixSeconds(t.timestamp()) tStart = tEnd.AddMinutes(-5); dataTime = api.ReadVariablesHistory(variables, tStart, tEnd) matrixTime = AggregationUtils.ExportToMatrix(dataTime) matrixTime.Print(numDigits=3) # matrixTime.TimestampsPosixSeconds may be used to convert to Python datetime numpy_array = np.array(matrixTime.Values) print(numpy_array[0])
count = 20 dataRaw = api.ReadVariablesHistoryLastN(variables, count) matrixRaw = AggregationUtils.ExportToMatrix(dataRaw) #matrixRaw.Print(numDigits=2)
dataAggregated = AggregationUtils.Aggregate(dataRaw, Aggregation.First, Duration.FromMinutes(1), False) matrixAggregated = AggregationUtils.ExportToMatrix(dataAggregated) #matrixAggregated.Print(numDigits=2)
def initialize(initParams): name = initParams.Calculation.Name print("initialize " + name)
def shutdown(): print("shutdown")
